name: Roasted Green Beans
ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds thin fresh green beans, trimmed

instructions.ja: オーブンを375°F（190°C）に予熱する

instructions.en: Trim the ends of the fresh green beans if necessary
instructions.sk: V prípade potreby odrežte konce čerstvých zelených fazuliek
instructions.ja: 必要に応じて新鮮なインゲン豆の両端を切り落とす

instructions.en: In a bowl, toss green beans with oil and salt
instructions.sk: V miske premiešajte zelené fazuľky s olejom a soľou
instructions.ja: ボウルでインゲン豆に油と塩を加えて混ぜる

instructions.en: Spread the seasoned green beans in a single layer on 2 sheet pans
instructions.sk: Rozložte ochutené zelené fazuľky v jednej vrstve na 2 plechy
instructions.ja: 味付けしたインゲン豆を2枚のシートパンに一層に広げる

instructions.en: Turn the beans over to ensure even browning
instructions.sk: Otočte fazuľky, aby sa rovnomerne opiekli
instructions.ja: 均一に焼き色がつくようにインゲン豆をひっくり返す

instructions.en: Continue roasting for another 10 minutes or until lightly browned and crisp-tender
instructions.sk: Pokračujte v pečení ďalších 10 minút alebo kým nebudú mierne hnedé a chrumkavé
instructions.ja: さらに10分間、または軽く焦げ目がついてカリッとするまで焼き続ける
